New Records: Taskin Ahmed became the leading wicket-taker in the Super 12 segment with 8 wickets.
Najmul Shanto scored his highest international T20 score with 71 runs.
Key Match Events: The final delivery had to be rebowled after Nurul Hasan took the ball ahead of the stumps.
Shakib Al Hasan ran out Sean Williams with a turn and throw to secure the victory.
Pre-Game Insights: Zimbabwe required 19 runs off nine balls when Bangladesh took the last wicket.
Bangladesh's bowlers had something to defend after a 54-run stand by Najmul Shanto and Shakib Al Hasan.
Post-Match Reflections: The win kept Bangladesh in contention with four points in Group Two.
The loss affected Zimbabwe's finals chances, leaving them on three points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A DRS review led to the players returning to the field for the last delivery.
The match had a dramatic finish with a crucial run-out by Shakib Al Hasan.
Others: The article provides detailed insights into the match events, key performances, and the outcome.
